name: decentralized-voting-system
description: Secure, transparent, and verifiable blockchain-based voting platform

scripts.install:all: npm run install:contracts && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && echo 'No build step for backend'
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:contracts: cd contracts && rm -rf artifacts cache typechain-types
